===Noun===

# {{lb|zh|literary|archaic}} [[servant]]s and [[maid-servant]]s {{qualifier|as a combined category}}
# {{lb|zh|literary|archaic}} [[I]]; your [[humble]] servant {{qualifier|term of self-address used by servants, maid-servants and eunuchs when addressing the emperor, ministers, concubines, etc.}}

====Usage notes====
The sense ''servants and maid-servants'' is an example of a {{zh-l|合稱}} in Chinese; the sense ''term of self-address'' is an example of a {{zh-l|自稱}}.
